siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Free Mac Plugin for cancelling noises in your Zoom/Teams/Slack meetings. Built with privacy in mind - all the data processing is done locally without leaving your device.
blogPost.body: Free Mac Plugin for cancelling noises in your Zoom/Teams/Slack meetings. Built with privacy in mind - all the data processing is done locally without leaving your device.
blogPost.title: Utterly - Noise cancellation for your Zoom meetings
blogPost.author: Batyr Nurbekov

localize.description: 免费Mac插件，用于消除Zoom/Teams/沙拉克会议中的噪音。以隐私为前提建立的--所有的数据处理都是在本地完成的，不需要离开你的设备。
免費Mac插件，用於消除Zoom/Teams/沙拉克會議中的噪音。以隱私爲前提建立的--所有的數據處理都是在本地完成的，不需要離開你的設備。

previous.excerpt: https://facet.ai is building the future of AI-assistive creative work. Our mission is to empower professional creatives and teams to collaborate seamlessly on art direction and spend less time pushing pixels.
previous.title: Facet - Content-aware image editing in your browser.

localize.description: https://facet.ai 正在打造人工智能辅助创意工作的未来。我们的使命是赋能专业的创意人员和团队，让他们在艺术指导上无缝协作，减少推送像素的时间。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中进行内容感知的图像编辑。

localize.description: https://facet.ai 正在打造人工智能輔助創意工作的未來。我們的使命是賦能專業的創意人員和團隊，讓他們在藝術指導上無縫協作，減少推送像素的時間。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中進行內容感知的圖像編輯。

next.excerpt: Datrics helps FinTech companies build and deploy machine learning models without writing code. Analysts and domain experts leverage a drag-n-drop interface to enable self-service analytics.
next.title: Datrics - Create a better credit-risk model in days without coding

localize.description: Datrics帮助金融科技公司建立和部署机器学习模型，而无需编写代码。分析师和领域专家利用拖放界面实现自助式分析。
localize.tagline: 不用编码，几天内就能建立更好的信用风险模型。

localize.description: Datrics幫助金融科技公司建立和部署機器學習模型，而無需編寫代碼。分析師和領域專家利用拖放界面實現自助式分析。
localize.tagline: 不用編碼，幾天內就能建立更好的信用風險模型。
